ChangeLogs.Description:
Requires Re-Scan.
Add addon name clicks to open their URL.

More protection against weird toc files.
Improvements to re-scan function.

Add some extra logging and error catching.
Fix some issues searching curse for addons for PTR clients.

Add Show Log Files button.
Add in recurring call to check for app updates every 10 minutes.
Better wow folder selection validation.

Add version checking to alert users of a new version available.
Fix support for classic/classic ptr/retail ptr addon folders.
Attempt to add support for Retail and Classic PTR clients
